name: Gibbon Time
description:
In this 2D platformer, you take on the role of a gibbon exploring an ancient underground temple. Armed with a powerful magic hourglass, you must race against the clock to defeat enemies and collect treasures before time runs out. As you progress through the temple, you'll encounter obstacles and enemies. However, with the power of the hourglass, you can steal their life force and gain an advantage over your enemies. You'll need to master your platforming skills and use quick reflexes to jump and avoid your way through the temple. In addition to defeating enemies, you'll also need to spend time to gain power-ups. With epic graphics and a catchy soundtrack, this game offers an experience that's both exciting and challenging. Whether you're a seasoned platformer fan or new to the genre, playing as a gibbon in this ancient temple promises to be a thrilling adventure.

Controls:

WASD for Movement

E for throw

J for reset
